sentences: Tema suve lõppedes jäid ränikese maha.
Jääd kodus ja tean ma sinu sõbra!
Ta jättis oma jääd tühja toa sees.
context: 'jääd' refers to the physical remnants or traces left behind after something has been used, consumed, or removed. It is often used in contexts involving leftovers from food, marks from an event, or objects abandoned by someone.
